wikipedia_page.main: Rebecca Anne Flint (born 5 June 1995), better known by her stage name Beckii Cruel, is a Manx businesswoman, YouTuber, singer, and dancer from England. In 2010 she reached popularity in Japan after her YouTube videos of her dancing to dance pop songs were posted around the Internet. She was the 17th most subscribed user (3rd most in the Musician category) in Japan on YouTube as of 25 August 2010. Her YouTube account has reached 20 million upload views and over 100,000 subscribers. In March 2019, she co-founded Pepper Studio, an influencer marketing agency in London.
